title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 2 cups black-eyed peas o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying

title:

Instructions:
text: o Soak black-eyed peas overnight, then peel and rinse. o Blend peas with diced onion, minced garlic, and salt until smooth. o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 block tofu o 1/4 cup cornstarch o 1 cup dashi broth o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 1 tablespoon mirin o 1/4 cup green onions o 1/4 cup grated daikon

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Cut tofu into cubes and coat with cornstarch. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Heat dashi broth with soy sauce and mirin. o Serve tofu in broth, topped with green onions and grated daikon.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
g
o 2 potatoes 
o 1 cauliflower 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon turmeric 
o 1 teaspoon coriander 
o 1 teaspoon garam masala 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 2 tablespoons oil o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon salt o 2 tablespoons oil

title:

Instructions:
text: o Peel and dice potatoes, cut cauliflower into florets. o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent. o Add cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute. o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices. o Cover and cook until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally. o Add salt to taste and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
g
o 1/2 pound ground beef
o 1/2 pound ground pork
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs 
o 1 egg 
o 1 teaspoon paprika 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 cup tomato sauce i o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs o 1 egg o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 cup tomato sauce

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
egg, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl. o Form mixture into meatballs. o Heat olive oil in a pan and brown meatballs on all sides. o Add tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto) o Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone) o Olives o Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers) o Breadsticks

title:

Instructions:
text: o Serve with breadsticks.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 2 cups cooked risotto
o 1/2 cup mozzarella 
o 1/2 cup flour 
o 2 eggs 
o 1 cup breadcrumbs 
o 1 cup vegetable oil o 2 cups cooked risotto o 2 eggs o 1 cup vegetable oil

title:

Instructions:
text: o Form risotto into balls and stuff with a cube of mozzarella. o Dredge balls in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 2 eggplants o 1/4 cup tahini o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash. o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food
processor. o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 4 cups cooked navy beans o 1 small onion o 1/2 cup molasses o 1/4 cup brown sugar o 1/4 cup ketchup o 1 tablespoon mustard o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). o Sauté diced onion until translucent. o Mix beans, onion, molasses, brown sugar, ketchup, mustard, salt, and pepper in a
baking dish. o Bake for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. o
Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 2 cups grated cassava o 1/4 cup coconut milk o 1 teaspoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text: o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt. o Form mixture into flat cakes. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi
 
Instructions:

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Prepare each side dish separately. o Arrange on small plates. o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 cup rice flour 
o 1/2 cup water 
o 1/2 cup coconut milk 
o 1/4 cup shrimp 
o 1/4 cup green onions
o 1/4 cup fried shallots
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon sugar o
1 cup rice flour o 1/2 cup water o 1/2 cup coconut milk o 1/4 cup shrimp o 1/4 cup green onions o 1/4 cup fried shallots o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon sugar

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Mix rice flour, water, coconut milk, salt, and sugar to form a batter. o Pour batter into small dishes and steam until set. o Sauté chopped shrimp and green onions until cooked. o Top steamed cakes with shrimp, green onions, and fried shallots. o Serve with dipping sauce.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 cup rice flour 
o 1/2 cup coconut milk 
o 1/2 cup water 
o 1/2 pound shrimp 
o 1/2 pound pork 
o 1 small onion 
o 1/2 cup bean sprouts
o 1/4 cup green onions
o 1/4 cup cilantro 
o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 cup rice flour o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Mix rice flour, coconut milk, water, turmeric, and salt to form a batter. o Sauté sliced pork, shrimp, and diced onion until cooked. o Heat oil in a pan and pour in a ladle of batter, swirling to coat the pan. o Add cooked pork, shrimp, bean sprouts, green onions, and cilantro. o Fold pancake in half and cook until crispy. o Serve with lettuce and dipping sauce.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound beef tenderloin o 1/4 cup paprika o 2 tablespoons cumin o 2 tablespoons fenugreek o 1 tablespoon garlic powder o
1 tablespoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Rub beef with salt and let cure in the refrigerator for 24 hours. o Rinse and pat dry. o Mix paprika, cumin, fenugreek, and garlic powder, then coat beef with the
mixture. o Wrap in cheesecloth and hang in a cool, dry place for 1-2 weeks. o Slice thinly and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast o 1 teaspoon sugar o 1 cup warm water o 3 cups flour o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup olive oil

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy. o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil. o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled. o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles. o Cook on a hot griddle until puffed and golden. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound okra 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon coriander 
o 1 teaspoon turmeric 
o 1 teaspoon garam masala 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 2 tablespoons oil

title:

Instructions:
text: o Wash and dry okra, then cut into pieces. o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent. o Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute. o Add okra and stir to coat with spices. o Cook until okra is tender, stirring occasionally. o Add salt to taste and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
Ingredients: 
o 1 pound ground beef 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup raisins 
o 1/4 cup almonds 
o 1 tablespoon curry powder
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper 
o 2 eggs 
o 1/2 cup milk 
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened. o Add ground beef, raisins, almonds, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook until
beef is browned. o Transfer mixture to a baking dish. o Beat eggs with milk and pour over the beef mixture. o Sprinkle with breadcrumbs. o Bake for 30 minutes until set and golden. o Serve warm.

title: Bok Choy with Garlic
text: o 1 pound bok choy o 2 cloves garlic o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 1 tablespoon sesame oil

title:

Instructions:
text: o Sauté minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant. o Add bok choy and stir-fry until tender. o Add soy sauce and cook for 2 minutes. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound salted cod 
o 4 potatoes 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup parsley 
o 2 eggs 
o 1 cup breadcrumbs 
o Oil for frying o 2 eggs

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Soak salted cod in water overnight, then rinse and flake. o Boil potatoes until tender, then mash. o Mix cod with mashed potatoes, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, and
beaten eggs. o Form mixture into balls and coat with breadcrumbs. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound fish fillets 
o 1/2 pound shrimp 
o 1/2 pound mussels 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 4 tomatoes 
o 4 cups fish stock 
o 1/2 cup white wine 
o 1 teaspoon saffron 
o 1 teaspoon thyme 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened. o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer
for 20 minutes. o Add fish fillets, shrimp, and mussels, cook until seafood is done. o Serve hot with crusty bread.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 4 potatoes 
o 1 small onion 
o 1/4 cup bacon 
o 2 tablespoons butter 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o 2 tablespoons butter o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Boil potatoes until tender, then slice. o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside. o Sauté sliced potatoes and diced onion in butter until golden. o Stir in bacon, salt, and pepper. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 2 potatoes 
o 2 zucchinis 
o 2 eggplants 
o 2 tomatoes 
o 1 small onion 
o 4 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 teaspoon oregano 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:

Instructions:
text: o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Slice potatoes, zucchinis, eggplants, and tomatoes. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened. o Layer vegetables in a baking dish, seasoning with oregano, salt, and pepper. o Pour sautéed onion and garlic over the top. o Bake for 45 minutes until vegetables are tender. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1/2 pound ground beef o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup parsley 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon cinnamon 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper 
o 1 package phyllo dough 
o 1/4 cup butter 
o Oil for frying

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked. o Stir in chopped parsley, cumin, cinnamon, salt, and pepper. o Cut phyllo dough into strips and brush with melted butter. o Place a spoonful of filling on each strip and fold into triangles. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 baguette 
o 4 tomatoes 
o 1/4 cup basil 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 teaspoon salt i

title:

Instructions:
text: o Slice baguette and toast until golden. o Dice tomatoes and chop basil. o Mix tomatoes, basil, minced garlic, olive oil, and salt. o Spoon mixture onto toasted bread and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup bulgur 
o 2 cups chicken broth 
o 1 small onion 
o 1 carrot 
o 1/4 cup parsley 
o 2 tablespoons olive oil 
o 1 teaspoon salt i

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Add bulgur and cook for 2 minutes. o Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until bulgur is tender. o Stir in chopped parsley and salt. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 2 eggplants o 2 cloves garlic o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 1 tablespoon lime juice o 1 tablespoon sugar o 1/4 cup cilantro

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Grill eggplants until charred and tender. o Peel and slice eggplants. o Mix minced garlic, fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar in a bowl. o Toss eggplants with the dressing. o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound callaloo leaves
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup coconut milk 
o 1 teaspoon thyme 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper i o 1 pound callaloo leaves o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup coconut milk o 1 teaspoon thyme o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened. o Add callaloo leaves and cook until wilted. o Stir in coconut milk, thyme, salt, and pepper. o Simmer for 10 minutes. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 4 cups fish stock 
o 1/2 pound fish fillets
o 1 cup pineapple 
o 1 cup tomatoes 
o 1 cup bean sprouts 
o 2 stalks lemongrass o 4 cups fish stock o 1/2 pound fish fillets o 1 cup pineapple o 1 cup tomatoes o 1 cup bean sprouts o 2 stalks lemongrass o
2-3 Thai chilies o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 2 tablespoons tamarind paste o 1 tablespoon sugar o 1/4 cup cilantro

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Bring fish stock to a boil. o Add lemongrass, chilies, and tamarind paste, simmer for 10 minutes. o Add pineapple, tomatoes, and fish fillets, cook until fish is done. o Stir in fish sauce, sugar, and bean sprouts. o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 4 tomatoes o 1 pound fresh mozzarella o 1/4 cup basil o
2 tablespoons olive oil o 1 tablespoon balsamic glaze o 1 teaspoon salt

title:

Instructions:
text: o Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. o Arrange on a plate, alternating slices. o Sprinkle with chopped basil, olive oil, balsamic glaze, and salt. o Serve immediately.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 4 carrots o 1/4 cup raisins o 1/4 cup parsley o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Grate carrots and mix with raisins and chopped parsley. o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, cumin, and salt, then pour over salad. o Toss well and serve chilled.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 1 pound fresh fish or shrimp o 1 cup lime juice o 1 small onion 
o 2 tomatoes 
o 1 jalapeño 
o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 1 teaspoon salt o 1 teaspoon salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Dice fish or shrimp and place in a bowl. o Pour lime juice over the seafood and let marinate for 30 minutes. o Dice onion, tomatoes, and jalapeño. o Chop cilantro. o Mix all ingredients together and add salt. o Serve chilled.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 package spring roll wrappers o 1/2 pound ground pork o 1/2 cup shrimp o 1/2 cup mushrooms o 1/4 cup carrots o 1/4 cup green onions o 2 cloves garlic o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 1 tablespoon sugar o Oil for frying

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped
green onions, minced garlic, fish sauce, and sugar in a bowl. o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and roll tightly. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve with dipping sauce.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 4 tomatoes 
o 2 bell peppers 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon paprika
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 4 eggs 
o 1/4 cup cilantro

title:

Instructions:
text:
o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell peppers in olive oil until
softened. o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes. o Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well. o Cover and cook until eggs are set. o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 2 cups cooked chickpeas 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon coriander 
o 1 teaspoon garam masala
o 1 teaspoon turmeric 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1 can diced tomatoes 
o 2 tablespoons oil o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon turmeric o
1 teaspoon salt o 1 can diced tomatoes o 2 tablespoons oil

title:

Instructions:
text: o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent. o Add cumin, coriander, garam masala, and turmeric, cook for 1 minute. o Add chickpeas and diced tomatoes, stir to combine. o Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. o Add salt to taste and serve.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text:
o 2 cups flour 
o 1/4 cup oil 
o 1/2 cup water 
o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup oil o 1/2 cup water o 1 teaspoon salt

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Mix flour, oil, water, and salt to form a dough, then let rest. o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles. o Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides. o
Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 1 pound pork shoulder o 1/4 cup hoisin sauce o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 2 tablespoons honey o 1 tablespoon rice wine o 1 teaspoon five-spice powder o 1 teaspoon garlic powder

title:
 
Instructions:
text:
o Mix hoisin sauce, soy sauce, honey, rice wine, five-spice powder, and garlic
powder in a bowl. o Marinate pork in the mixture for at least 2 hours. o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Place pork on a baking sheet and roast for 45 minutes, basting occasionally. o Let rest before slicing and serving.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 2 eggs o 1 cup dashi broth o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 tablespoon mirin o 1/4 cup chicken o 1/4 cup shrimp o 1/4 cup mushrooms

title:

Instructions:
text: o Beat eggs with dashi broth, soy sauce, and mirin. o Place chicken, shrimp, and mushrooms in small bowls. o Pour egg mixture over the top. o Steam for 15 minutes until set. o Serve warm.

title:
 
Ingredients:
text: o 4 poblano peppers o 1 cup shredded cheese o 1/2 cup flour o 4 eggs o 1 cup vegetable oil o 1 cup tomato sauce

title:
 
Instructions:
text: o Roast peppers until charred, then peel and remove seeds. o Stuff peppers with cheese. o Separate eggs and beat whites until stiff, then fold in yolks. o Dredge peppers in flour, then dip in egg mixture. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Serve with warmed tomato sauce.
